item.title: Anyfactor - Developer first product/solutions dude
item.description: I am a DevRel at a data company. I am very happy with my full time job. …but I moonlight as a freelance Python developer specializing in product and feature development that focuses on data, automation and API development. You can find more info here: https://anyfactor.xyz I love to solve problems with programming. I enjoy programming and I am great at at explaining technical things in layperson terms. I spend my weekends mostly indiehacking or programming either for clients or for myself. I am open to Business + Programming ‘hybrid’ roles in super part time projects. < 20 Hours / Week including weekends.

item.title: Do modern hosting services have a sustainable business model?
item.description: There are no hosting company offers a VPS for free. Hosting anything on the web should atleast have some costs associated with them. But why are there free hosting services?
